entry.title: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 12 at 10:47PM AKST until January 14 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...LONG DURATION SNOW EVENT FOR THIS WEEKEND... .Light snow has begun and will continue into the weekend across the northern panhandle. Snowfall rates will gradually increase in intensity through the weekend as well. Snow has started dry and fluffy but may become wetter and heavier as temperatures warm through the weekend.

entry.title: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 13 at 5:01AM CST until January 13 at 12:00PM CST by NWS
